girlie.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a girl or woman who is girlie behaves in a silly way, for example by pretending to be shy or always thinking about how she looks
girlie.translation[0].definitions[1].def: suitable only for girls rather than men or boys
girlie.translation[1].definitions[0].def: an offensive word used by men when talking to a woman who they think is less sensible or intelligent than a man
